                           java.time.LocalDateTime RezTime,
                           java.lang.String CustomerName,
                           int CustomerGender,
                           boolean MembershipStatus,
                           int CustomerID)
        Adding a reservation to array of tables
        Parameters:
        Pax - : number of people on the table
        RezTime - : time of reservation
        CustomerName - : string of customerName
        CustomerGender - : int of customerGender
        MembershipStatus - : boolean for MembershipStatus
        CustomerID - : int for unique customerID Assigns a table that matches the size and vacancy requirements
